description: Our paper, "Can GPT-4 Replicate Empirical Software Engineering Research?" was accepted to ACM ESEC/FSE 2024. See you in Porto de Galinhas, Brazil! 🇧🇷
Excited to return to Microsoft Research this summer to work on the PROSE Team with Gustavo Soares. 🤗 Hello, Seattle!
Our paper, "NLPositionality: Measuring Positionality and Design Biases in Datasets and Models in NLP", won an Outstanding Paper Award at ACL 2023. 🏆
Our paper, "A Qualitative Study on the Implementation Design Decisions of Developers", won the ACM SIGSOFT Distinguished Paper Award at ICSE 2023. 🏆
